borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Part demolition, part extension and alteration of the existing buildings and structures, change of use of the existing buildings and the erection of a new building including provision of a basement, to provide residential units (Use Class C3) and associated ancillary communal floorspace, a Care Home (Use Class C2) and flexible non-residential floorspace (Classes E, F1 and F2), together with associated roof top installations and structures, private and communal amenity space, landscaping, access, refuse storage, parking and associated works.Reason for re-consultation - an amended scheme has been submitted. Amendments are summarised as follows:	- Basement car park has been removed, blue badge parking relocated to ground level within the site	- Relocation of cycle storage from basement to ground floor within the site	- Associated changes to landscaping and enhanced planting to courtyard pond	- Amendments to the design of the entrances to Block E & F 	- Changes to materiality and faÃ§ade design of Block E & F
